text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid

title: IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:00:01+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give the Typhoid vaccine between age 6 months - 45 years old

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT14

action

title: Immunize Patient for Typhoid - No doses

description: Provide Typhoid immunizations – using the "TCV vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Typhoid vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with TCV vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with TCV vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" <= 45text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with TCV vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Region recommends Typhoid vaccination" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with TCV vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country is administering the TCV vaccine" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with TCV vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Typhoid - No Doses

description: Provide Typhoid immunizations – using the "ViPS vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Typhoid vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 2text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Region recommends Typhoid vaccination" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country is administering the ViPS vaccine" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Typhoid - Last dose given 3 years ago

description: Provide Typhoid revaccination – using the "ViPS vaccine – Revaccination every 3 years" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient has completed Typhoid primary series" = TRUEtext/cqlShould Re-vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Typhoid dose given" >= "3 years"text/cqlShould Re-vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Type of last Typhoid dose" = "ViPS"text/cqlShould Re-vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Region recommends Typhoid vaccination" = TRUEtext/cqlShould Re-vaccinate patient with ViPS vaccine on a 1 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.14.Typhoid.03

action

title: Immunize Patient for Typhoid - No Doses

description: Provide Typhoid immunizations – using the "Ty21a vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Typhoid vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Ty21a vaccine on a 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" > 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Ty21a vaccine on a 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Ty21a vaccine on a 3 dose scheme
